summary.span: 代表 Managed 程式碼的符號寫入器。

span.span: Represents a symbol writer for managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍變數的方法。The class provides methods that define documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.

span.span: If zero, this parameter is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.

summary.span: 在目前的語彙範圍中定義單一變數。

span.span: Defines a single variable in the current lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `startOffset`和`endOffset`參數是選擇性的。The `startOffset` and `endOffset` parameters are optional. 如果其值為零，則會予以忽略，並在整個範圍定義的變數。If their value is zero, they are ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope. 如果其值為非零值，其會落在目前範圍的位移。If their value is nonzero, they fall within the offsets of the current scope. 您可以呼叫多次的整個範圍的不同位移範圍中出現多個相同名稱的變數。You can call multiple times for a variable of the same name that occurs multiple times in different offset ranges throughout a scope. （在此情況下，開始和結束位移不得重疊。）(In this case, start and end offsets must not overlap.)

abstract member DefineSequencePoints : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit override this.DefineSequencePoints : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: symWriter.DefineSequencePoints (document, offsets, lines, columns, endLines, endColumns)

param.name: document
param.span: 要為其定義序列點的文件物件。

span.span: The document object for which the sequence points are being defined.

param.name: offsets
param.span: 從方法的開頭進行測量之序列點的 IL 位移。

span.span: The IL offset of the sequence points measured from the beginning of the method.
The starting line numbers of the sequence points.
The starting column numbers of the sequence points.
The ending line numbers of the sequence points.
The ending column numbers of the sequence points.

summary.span: 在目前的方法內定義一組序列點。

span.span: Defines a group of sequence points within the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列點用來對應來源檔案位置和 IL 位移。Sequence points are used to map between source file locations and IL offsets. 每個序列點 IL 位移和來源檔案指定的區域，以開始和結束行/資料行的數字，相對於包含物件。Each sequence point consists of an IL offset and source file region, specified by start and end line/column numbers relative to an object. 位於指定索引的每個陣列的每個項目會對應至特定的序列點。Each element at a specific index of every array corresponds to a specific sequence point. 每一列和每個資料行定義中方法的陳述式開頭。Each line and each column defines the start of a statement within a method. 陣列應該依照遞增的位移。The arrays should be sorted in the increasing order of offsets. 此位移一律為開頭的方法，以位元組為單位的位移。The offset is always the offset from the start of the method, in bytes.

summary.span: 釋出 Unmanaged 資源並執行其他清除作業後，記憶體回收才能重新回收 。

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非呼叫已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method.

param.name: method

summary.span: 開啟要置入符號資訊的方法。

span.span: Opens a method in which to place symbol information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法會變成目前的方法，來定義序列點、 參數和語彙範圍的呼叫。The specified method becomes the current method for calls to define sequence points, parameters, and lexical scopes. 沒有隱含的語彙範圍，整個方法。There is an implicit lexical scope around the entire method. 重新開啟先前已關閉的方法，就會清除任何先前定義的符號方法。Reopening a method that has been previously closed erases any previously defined symbols for the method.

returns.span: 範圍識別項只有在目前方法中才會有效。

span.span: A scope identifier is valid only in the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此範圍會成為新的目前範圍，並推送至堆疊的範圍。This scope becomes the new current scope and is pushed onto a stack of scopes. 範圍必須形成階層。Scopes must form a hierarchy. 同層級項目不允許重疊。Siblings are not allowed to overlap. 範圍識別項的有效期僅在目前的方法。Scope identifiers are only valid in the current method.

param.span: 程式碼的 類型指標，這是基礎寫入器。

span.span: An type pointer to code that is the underlying writer.

summary.span: 設定 Managed 用來發出符號的基礎 [ISymUnmanagedWriter Interface](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md) 介面 (對應的 Unmanaged API)。

span.span: Sets the underlying [ISymUnmanagedWriter Interface](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md) (the corresponding unmanaged API) that a managed uses to emit symbols.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基礎[ISymUnmanagedWriter 介面](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md)(對應的 unmanaged API) 介面代表 managed 程式碼的符號寫入器。The underlying [ISymUnmanagedWriter Interface](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md) (the corresponding unmanaged API) interface represents a symbol writer for managed code. 介面會提供方法來定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍變數。The interface provides methods to define documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.

permission.span: 提供存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.

abstract member UsingNamespace : string -> unit override this.UsingNamespace : string -> unit

span.span: The fully qualified name of the namespace.

summary.span: 指定是在開放式語彙範圍內使用指定且完整的命名空間名稱。

span.span: Specifies that the given, fully qualified namespace name is used within the open lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉目前的範圍，可防止此範圍內使用的命名空間。Closing the current scope prevents this scope from using the namespace. 命名空間中保持使用中的所有領域都繼承自目前開啟的範圍。The namespace remains in use in all scopes that inherit from the current open scope.
